tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Pain in Left part of Chest,
review: Doctor panduranga his patience level is top notch, hears all the issues and condition, and prescribe tests accordingly, friendliness is his nature, given medicines hopefully I will be better for the next meet.

I had a great experience with Dr. Pandurang. He was very friendly and approachable, making me feel comfortable throughout the consultation. His diagnosis was precise and to the point. I especially appreciated how he took the time to clearly explain the condition of my aortic valve. His clear communication greatly alleviated my concerns. Thank you, Doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: I am living outside of india and one of my friend has given the doctor number for my mother’s health issue. I was worried about her health at that time and contacted him through the what’’sup, but once she met him in the hospital then he reacted and identified her problem Quickly. I can see her improvement once she followed the proscription, so I can happily refer him to my friends and family. The good thing about him is he is caring and giving priority to elderly people and also we can reach him very easily. All the best. Thanks

A humble and nice gentleman Dr. panduranga is also a wonderful doctor who has saved my life and also has been giving me apt guidance on how to manage my lifestyle whenever I have sought his help. He has immense patience and bears a gentle approach towards his patients and their kins that makes me and my family very comfortable around him. He also belives in keeping things simple as much as possible which comes very useful in times of distress. His temperament and depth of knowledge are a potent combination to heal a person from within. I feel very fortunate to have come across him and for staying under his guidance. 

I wish him all the very best in his personal and professional life.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Doctor friendliness,
review:
I would personally recommend Dr. Panduranga for everything related to heart, he is extremely good and knows perfectly on how to manage elderly parents. He is so polite and humble. He has treated my mom and gave the best ever results, his way of explaining the treatment is excellent in layman's terms. His approach towards the patient is very professional and honest. 

I'm glad to have met him and got my mom's treatment done since last year. 
As of now, Dr. Panduranga is treating my mom and my mother in law with great results.

Personally I feel confident on depending on his medical expertise without worrying about the second opinion. 

Thanks Dr. Panduranga for your continuous support and guidance.

review:
We came from Guntur We had consult with doctor Panduranga sunshine hospital Gachibowli. Patient had heart stroke. Doctor advised to do angiography and we found blockages instantly we urged the Doctor to remove the blockages. He had done angioplasty and we are satisfied with his treatment and patient condition is also stable and thanks to Dr Panduranga for his timely advice and treatment.

Thanks & Regards
Manoj

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,
review:

mend the doctor to family and friends..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I met Dr. Pandurang in Emergency Care for my Father when he got heart pain. Now a days I have never seen such a friendly doctor who is a go to person. He spent enough time with us explaining the issue very clearly. He was never in hurry while treating or while talking to us about the condition of patient. He was to the point in diagnosing the issue and treated immediately. I strongly recommend Dr. Pandurang for any cardio related issues. Thank You Doctor for such a great patience.

review:
It was our first visit, my mother in law had high bp with certain deficiencies which led to joint pain etc.
He made her very comfortable and gave such treatment such that she recovered within the span of 5 days .. its been approx 3-4 months she has not complained about any joint pains and feels much energetic than before. 
Dr.Pandurang is quite approachable as well if we are not able to visit the clinic personally.

Thank you.

review:
I was suffering from high hypertension and one day fell down in the ofc and same time my colleague admitted in the hospital that time Dr Panduranga Sir was on duty and treated me in emergency room within three hours my BP was stable and  discharged in the evening only With prescription 
First one month I had taken high dose medicines After one month he prescribed me the less dose medicines 

now one year passed and And I am fit and fine with less dose of medicines 
Thanks a lot Sir
